Package de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.wikipedia.measures

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Measures  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefinitionBasedComparator  
    InformationContentBasedComparator  
    JiangConrathAverageComparator  
    JiangConrathBestComparator  
    JiangConrathComparator
    Implements the distance measure by JiangConrath (1997) jc(c1,c2) = IC(c1) + IC(c2) - 2* IC( lcs(c1,c2) ) Note that jc returns a distance value rather than a similarity value.
    LeacockChodorowAverageComparator  
    LeacockChodorowBestComparator  
    LeacockChodorowComparator
    Implements the relatedness measure by Leacock and Chodorow (1998) lch(c1,c2) = - log(minPathLength(c1,c2) / 2 * depth of the hierarchy) lch(c1,c2) = - log(minPL(c1,c2) / 2 * depth) = log( 2*depth / minPL(c1,c2) ) minPathLength is measured in edges (original definition measures in nodes).
    LeacockChodorowSelectivityComparator  
    LeskComparator
    Implements the distance measure by Lesk (1986) lesk(c1,c2) = overlap(t1,t2)/min(length(t1),length(t2))
    LeskFirstComparator
    Implements the distance measure by Lesk (1986) lesk(c1,c2) = overlap(t1,t2)/min(length(t1),length(t2)) Uses only the first paragraph of an article.
    LeskFullComparator
    Implements the distance measure by Lesk (1986) lesk(c1,c2) = overlap(t1,t2)/min(length(t1),length(t2)) Uses the full text of an article.
    LinAverageComparator  
    LinBestComparator  
    LinComparator
    Implements the distance measure by Lin (1998) lin(c1,c2) = 2 * ic ( lcs(c1,c2) ) / IC(c1) + IC(c2)
    MeasuresTest  
    PathBasedComparator
    Helper methods for path based comparators.
    PathLengthAverageComparator  
    PathLengthBestComparator  
    PathLengthComparator
    Implements the distance measure by Rada et al. (1989).
    PathLengthSelectivityComparator  
    RelatednessUtilities  
    ResnikAverageComparator  
    ResnikBestComparator  
    ResnikComparator
    Implements the distance measure by Resnik (1995) res(c1,c2) = informationContent ( lowestCommonSubsumer(c1,c2) ) res(c1,c2) = ic ( lcs(c1,c2) )
    ResnikSelectivityLinearComparator  
    ResnikSelectivityLogComparator  
    WikiLinkCache  
    WikiLinkComparator  
    WikiLinkMeasureTest  
    WikiLinkPerformanceTest  
    WikipediaRelatednessMeasureBase  
    WuPalmerAverageComparator  
    WuPalmerBestComparator  
    WuPalmerComparator
    Implements the relatedness measure by Wu Palmer et al. (1994).
  • Enum Summary

    Measures.Measure
    The available relatedness measures.
